nodes.text: The Luxe Flightwing was a limited-production, swift, gleaming white starship. The Flightwing consisted of a curved nose and swept-back wings, having such a unique profile that it was nearly unforgettable to those who saw it. Its exterior surface was made of a rare, white ore.

In 24 BBY, dangerous convict Jenna Zan Arbor, recently escaped from the planet Vanqor, purchased a Luxe Flightwing, which enabled Jedi Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker to track down the deranged scientist through her singularly uncommon ship-purchase to the planet Romin.
